alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 2:44PM CDT until June 27 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 243 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Campo to 4 miles southwest of Wheeless, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Boise City, Keyes, Wheeless, Black Mesa Park and Felt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
